text:
e="preserve">Galyn Görg, pronounced George, also credited as Galyn Gorg, Galan Gorg and Gaylyn Görg (July 15, 1964 – July 14, 2020) was an American actress and dancer. She was best known for her role in the movies, "RoboCop 2" as Angie, the Nuke addicted bad girl; on "M.A.N.T.I.S.", television's first black superhero program, as Lt. Maxwell and on the television show "Twin Peaks" as Nancy O'Reilly. She was born in Los Angeles.
Görg died of cancer in Los Angeles on July 14, 2020, the day before her 56th birthday.
